feature.name: Otherworldly Patron: Ungodly SCIENCE! (HB)
feature.text:
You serve the mistress of SCIENCE! The greatest patron of them all! Nothing compares to the beauty of the universe unfolding before your very eyes as the mind untangles mysteries hitherto unsolved. Are we living in a simulation? Is this one of many universes? Is there such a thing as free will, or are we all puppets dancing to a tune we cannot hear?
Curiosity drives you. The truth is the greatest treasure in the universe! Some call you mad, but they simply fail to recognize your genius for what it is. You'll show them! You'll show them all...
But science is a capricious god, and failure is as common (if not more so) than success. Who can predict the results of an experiment? And so what if things explode sometimes, how is that your problem?
Ungodly SCIENCE! lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following new spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

feature.name: Ungodly Science (HB): Weaponized Spellcasting
feature.text: At 1st level, you learn how to craft a technological weapon that can produce scientific effects identical to spells. When you cast spells, you do so by activating your technological weapon, making it a requirement for the casting of all spells as though it were an arcane or divine focus. Only you are able to use your technological weapon. It has an AC equal to 10 + double your proficiency bonus and 5 hit points per warlock level.

At 9th level, the spells you cast using Weaponized Spellcasting and any technological items you craft are immune to the effects of counterspell and dispel magic. At 18th level, they become immune to the effects of antimagic field.
